Questions

Do instructors speak during class?

No. Corrections are conveyed through arm paths, floor taps, and gaze direction.

Can complete beginners attend?

Yes. We begin with standing still until stillness feels like intention.

What should I bring?

Socks, water, and one doorbell memory you are ready to retire.
